website_summaries.verdict: The reviews are decidedly mixed on this blue-yellow corrective model, but many wearers report immediate results, especially when worn outdoors. Affordable option for those diagnosed with Tritanopia.
pros: Many wearers report instant improvement in reds and greens
Sunglass-style frames are lightweight and stylish
Designed for the less common blue-yellow form of color blindness
cons: May not correct blue color blindness as promoted
Enhances reds, but distorts other colors

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mom for mother's day. She is blue/green colorblind. We were sitting outside and she put them on and didn't notice much until she looked up and was able to see blue sky through the leafs on a tree. Prior is was just a big mass of "green". We went inside and she was able to see yellows, tans and browns that she has struggled with. I'm not sure if an optometrist could add this to existing lenses but for this price it was totally worth it. For her it worked. I read reviews before purchasing it and it seems the seller does refunds. So if you have tritanomaly I say this product is worh trying.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great! I am moderately blue-yellow colorblind, and these glasses mostly help me to distinguish between blue and purple, but also help with yellow and green.The only thing I noticed is that the lenses are a bit darker than they appear in the picture, but I think that that makes them look even better! I would totally recommend these for anyone with blue-yellow colorblindness.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Total scam
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely disappointing. I got these as a gift for my stepmom and she literally thought it was a gag gift. They are cheaply made and didn't do anything to correct her vision. Totally embarrassing having a gift you purchase be mistaken for a gag when you purchased it with the best intentions. And yes, I confirmed that the vision type would have worked with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omg
customer_reviews.text: OMG OMG OMG i can not belive it my husband who is 30 can now see color true color for the first time. He was in shock was looking all over the house went outside and seen how green grass is this is amazing. Great product
customer_reviews.author: ashbash1989

customer_reviews.title: They worked!
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law and my husband are both blue yellow colorblind. My mother in law has a more severe case and it worked great for her! She saw purple for the first time in her life. Was able to see the different greens in the treeline. My husband has a mild case and it just turned everything blue for him. I would recommend these for very colorblind people like my mil. It was amazing to see her reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are alright. Kinda helps.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have Tritanomaly (starting to develop into tritanopia) which was acquired from a car accident. It’s nice to see green and blue better since we have green lasers for inspection at work but they won’t let me wear them because they are “tinted” so I haven’t really had the need to wear them much but they are alright. Just wish the lenses weren’t plastic and help out more with yellow side of tritanopia too. And obviously it seems a bit overboard for Tritanomaly but like I said its progressively getting worse so my review may change depending on how bad I get and to see how effective these are for when that happens
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: These say they are for Tritanomaly but they are not. They just make everything look blue. Don't waste your money. These do not work. I returned them. PLUS, they came with a missing piece on the side.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: They worked!
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and father are color blind. They tried a pair and found them effective, particularly in outside lighting. They were amazed to see the difference shadows make on color and could actually differentiate between Christmas garland green and the green of the bushes the garland was next too. My son said "I am finally seeing the world the way I was supposed too." That being said, they won't be worn much as both of them have prescription glasses and would have to wear these over those.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought to tears with his vision back
customer_reviews.text: My son say if he could give y'all 10 stars he would. There is not enough words to describe how amazing it was. The money doesn't matter cause the experience was priceless. He cried for a sold 10 min because he could see all the colors again. He became color blind at age 9 he was hit by a car and it made him have vision problems including color blindness. Thank you so much for giving my son his love of color back.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: False advertising or product ignorance
customer_reviews.text: These glasses do help distinguish blues and greens much better but also compromises the hues of every other color making them impossible to distinguish. The note the game with the glasses was not personalized because it stated the glasses were to help red-green color blindness and will not help blue blindness even though it is advertised as such. The glasses help only if you’re looking at those colors and compromise every other color. Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses for my 16 year old son that developed Tritanopia (blue color blindness) a year ago. It was an affordable price so I figured we would give it a try. Luckily we had a beautiful blue sky the day they arrived early. My son put them on and looked at the sky and said "Wow, I haven't seen that for awhile - it is so blue today!" I can't imagine the sky always being grey so when they worked I cried tears of joy that my son could see the world the way he remembered and the way we all see it. Thank you for prompt delivery and a great product that really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: pinkerbella

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses for my hisband who has Tritanomoly. They have changed both our lives!! I HIGHLY recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Just sunglasses with blue tinted lenses.
customer_reviews.text: These didn't do anything but turn everything blue. They do nothing to correct tritomal or any colorblindness. Waste of time and money, returned for a refund. Spent 5 bucks for label and bag. Don't waste your time. It's sad to see people with disabilities being taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: Bengy J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: They DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I took three different CB tests. Without glasses I was STRONG PROTAN on all three. With the glasses I was STRONG DEUTAN on all three. What good is that ? Very disappointing . Going from RED-GREEN to BLUE YELLOW is not an improvement .
customer_reviews.author: George McGhee

customer_reviews.title: worked for my BF!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried these wouldn't work but the were fantastic! He has tritanopia (blue-yellow colorblind) and he iss very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Alderink

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these glasses for our son and he loves them! He does alot of homework on the computer and these glasses helped him see the words on the screen. He says the blues and yellows are vivid. Thinking of purchasing the red/green contact for him also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has yellow/blue color blind & I bought these hoping they would work and not only did they work they changed his life! He can't stop thanking me lol I'm glad I got these & saved money too!
customer_reviews.author: MONICA VAUGHN

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my girlfriend. She absolutley loved them and swears they work. She is blind to blues and slightly to greens and purples and these helped her experience those colors would recommend them for anyone with a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying my life was so dull before I tried these glasses, Shipping was quick and packaged great. I was super skeptical about spending $300 on the Enchroma’s so I went went these. Well worth the money I spent now I can now see colors brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Blake bauman

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: This helped me beyond anything I could have imagined. I’m 36 years old and this is the first time I’m seeing the world in full color. I fully recommend this to anyone with tritinopia. Especially since it’s the rarest form of colorblindness. These work!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dahl

customer_reviews.title: May help someone else but not me
customer_reviews.text: May be it works for someone else, but not for me, online test shows I am blue and yellow blindness (maybe just week), but the glass won't help me.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to one at this price with a clear lens.
customer_reviews.author: UPS GUY

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: 5 yrs ago my son got a terrible concussion and became Triton color blind. I got these glasses for him and he almost cried! He can see yellow and blue again <3
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend cannot see blue or green. All he sees instead is shades of gray. When he put them on it turned everything gray. Don’t waste your money. They are cheaply made too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsie B

customer_reviews.title: More vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: My husband sees "color", but his color is dull and muted and we have to tell him what color is what sometimes. I was worried these wouldn't work st all, but he has had them on on and off all afternoon ❤
customer_reviews.author: Laura Meents

customer_reviews.title: They do in fact work
customer_reviews.text: With these glasses I can actually see color for the first time
customer_reviews.author: Brayton Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great for yellow-blue
customer_reviews.text: These are great for blue-yellow blind! My daughter loves them. The seller included a personalized letter and wants customers to be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amy86ducky

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work . Too bad they don't . So be very careful prior to ordering a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and misleading
customer_reviews.text: The quality was like a cheap pair of 3D glasses. I can buy a blue lense anywhere. Very disappointed and am requesting an immediate refund. Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Henry

customer_reviews.title: Scan
customer_reviews.text: Description was wrong, this is for red color blindness. Everything is just a blue hue. Worst waste of my money yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chance R.
